listitem.para: Select a filter from the list of available filters, then select the QUERY button to generate results based on that filter. You can also build your own search criteria dynamically, using the "+" and "-" buttons. To learn more about working with search filters, please see .
Select this button to show the parameters underlying the saved filter. To hide the details, simply click this button a second time.
When building your own search criteria, select from the following options:

Select this button to save your filter set to the list of saved filters. Saved filters may be applied to future searches. If you are modifying an already-existing filter—and you want to keep your changes—be sure to save them or they will be lost.
Select this button to reach the list of saved filters.
Select to add new search parameters when building an ad hoc query. Ad hoc searching is supported, but searches must be saved if you want them to be available for future use.
Select to remove search parameters when building an ad hoc query. Ad hoc searching is supported, but searches must be saved if you want them to be available for future use.
